title: This Galaxy Note 7 Won't Explode (Probably)
description: Meet the Note FE: the Galaxy Note 7 that won't explode. Samsung Galaxy Note Fan Edition on Amazon:  Is the OnePlus 5 Worth It?  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:  Facebook:
